mapper.update:
update book_book
bk_parent_id = #{bkParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_level = #{bkLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_order = #{bkOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_name = #{bkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_item_num = #{bkItemNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_direct_item_num = #{bkDirectItemNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_author = #{bkAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_book = #{bkBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_comment = #{bkComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_orgnization = #{bkOrgnization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_publisher = #{bkPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_version = #{bkVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bk_flag = #{bkFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bk_id = #{bkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update book_book set bk_parent_id = #{bkParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_level = #{bkLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_order = #{bkOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_name = #{bkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_item_num = #{bkItemNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_direct_item_num = #{bkDirectItemNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_author = #{bkAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_book = #{bkBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_comment = #{bkComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_orgnization = #{bkOrgnization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_publisher = #{bkPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_version = #{bkVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bk_flag = #{bkFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where bk_id = #{bkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.bk_name,t.bk_id FROM book_book t LEFT JOIN book_school b ON t.bk_parent_id = b.bk_parent_id
WHERE b.school_classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t.bk_name LIKE concat('%',#{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY t.`bk_parent_id`,t.`bk_name`, t.bk_order
